FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform

aiStaking.question: What is AI-powered staking?
aiStaking.answer: Our AI-powered staking platform combines traditional staking with advanced artificial intelligence trading algorithms. The AI bot trades across multiple exchanges 24/7 to generate optimal returns for our stakers.

returns.question: How are the returns generated?
returns.answer: Returns are generated through a combination of staking rewards and AI trading profits. Our system automatically executes trades across various cryptocurrency exchanges to maximize profits while maintaining strict risk management protocols.

lockup.question: Is there a lock-up period?
lockup.answer: No, there is no lock-up period. You can withdraw your earnings daily. However, each stake will automatically stop once it reaches 400% of the initial investment.

amounts.question: What are the minimum and maximum stake amounts?
amounts.answer: The minimum stake amount is $100. Maximum amounts vary by plans: Starter ($100-$999), Bronze ($1,000-$4,999), Silver ($5,000-$9,999), Gold ($10,000-$19,999), and Diamond ($20,000+).

tokens.question: Which tokens can I stake?
tokens.answer: Currently, we support staking of USDT, FIL, LINK, and BNB. We regularly evaluate and may add more tokens based on market conditions and community demand.

rewards.question: How often can I claim rewards?
rewards.answer: Rewards can be claimed daily. The monthly MPY ranges from 9% to 18% depending on your staking tier, and you can continue earning until reaching 400% of your initial stake.

referral.question: How does the referral program work?
referral.answer: Our partner program offers three types of commissions: Direct Referral (6% for F1, 1% for F2 and F3), Profit Sharing across 10 levels (1-10%), and Leader Performance Bonus (up to 3% extra commission).

requirements.question: What are the requirements for each leader rank?
requirements.answer: Leader ranks are based on team volume: Silver ($100K), Gold ($500K), Platinum ($1M), Diamond ($5M), and Royal ($10M). Each rank comes with increased commission rates and benefits.

commissions.question: How are commissions calculated and paid?
commissions.answer: Commissions are calculated based on your referrals' staking amounts and profits. They are paid in the same token as the original stake and can be claimed daily.

platform.question: How secure is the platform?
platform.answer: We implement multiple security measures including multi-signature wallets, real-time monitoring systems, and regular security audits. Our AI trading system also includes risk management protocols to protect user funds.

losses.question: What happens if the AI bot makes losses?
losses.answer: Our AI system is designed with strict risk management protocols. While trading involves inherent risks, we maintain reserve funds to ensure consistent staking rewards regardless of market conditions.

audits.question: Are the smart contracts audited?
audits.answer: Yes, all our smart contracts are audited by leading blockchain security firms. Audit reports are publicly available, and we regularly undergo security assessments.

blockchain.question: What blockchain does the platform use?
blockchain.answer: Our platform operates on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), which provides fast transactions and low fees, making it ideal for staking operations.

audit.question: Is the smart contract audited?
audit.answer: Yes, our smart contracts have been audited by CertiK and PeckShield, two leading blockchain security firms. The audit reports are publicly available on our website under the 'Security' section.

rewards.question: How does the smart contract handle rewards distribution?
rewards.answer: The smart contract automatically calculates rewards based on your staking tier and duration. Rewards are distributed daily and can be claimed at any time. The contract uses a time-weighted average to ensure fair distribution.

congestion.question: What happens if there's a network congestion?
congestion.answer: Our smart contract is designed to handle network congestion efficiently. In case of high network traffic, the contract will queue transactions and process them in order once the network stabilizes, ensuring no rewards are lost.

interaction.question: Can I interact directly with the smart contract?
interaction.answer: Yes, advanced users can interact directly with our smart contract using blockchain explorers or wallet interfaces. However, we recommend using our platform interface for the best experience and to avoid potential errors.

address.question: What's the contract address?
address.answer: Our main staking contract address is 0xc2d8434B6875394637e5a943c2103639E22D26D5. Always verify this address on our official website to avoid scams.

swapFeature.title: Swap Feature Now in Beta
swapFeature.description: We're excited to announce that our Swap feature is now available in beta! Users can now exchange tokens directly on the OptiFund platform with competitive rates and low transaction fees. The feature integrates with KyberSwap's aggregator to ensure the best possible rates across multiple DEXs. Try it out and share your feedback as we continue to optimize the experience.

stakingPlans.title: New Staking Plans Released
stakingPlans.description: We're excited to announce our new staking tier system with enhanced MPY rates ranging from 9% to 18%. Long-term stakers will benefit from additional rewards including reduced fees, priority support, and exclusive access to new features. The new system is designed to reward commitment and encourage sustainable growth in our ecosystem.

securityUpdate.title: Platform Security Update
securityUpdate.description: Our latest security update implements industry-leading protection measures including multi-signature wallets, enhanced encryption protocols, and real-time monitoring systems. We've also partnered with leading blockchain security firms to conduct regular audits and penetration testing, ensuring your assets remain protected.

aiStaking.question: What is AI-powered staking?
aiStaking.answer: Our AI-powered staking platform combines traditional staking with advanced artificial intelligence trading algorithms. The AI bot trades across multiple exchanges 24/7 to generate optimal returns for our stakers.

whatIsAzcoin.question: What is Azcoin?
whatIsAzcoin.answer: Azcoin is a blockchain-based staking platform that allows users to earn stable profits by staking tokens like FIL, BNB, and others, with a multi-level commission system and daily profit opportunities

maxOutLimit.question: What is the Max out limit?
maxOutLimit.answer: The Max out limit caps total commission earnings at 4 times the investment amount. For example, if you stake $100, total commission (from referrals and profit sharing) is capped at $400.

returns.question: How are returns generated?
returns.answer: Returns are generated through a combination of staking rewards and AI trading profits. Our system automatically executes trades across various cryptocurrency exchanges to maximize profits while maintaining strict risk management protocols.

lockup.question: Is there a lock-up period?
lockup.answer: No, there is no lock-up period. You can withdraw your earnings daily. However, each stake will automatically stop once it reaches 400% of the initial investment.

tokens.question: Which tokens can I stake?
tokens.answer: Currently, we support staking of USDT, FIL, LINK, and BNB. We regularly evaluate and may add more tokens based on market conditions and community demand.

blockchain.question: What blockchain does the platform use?
blockchain.answer: Our platform operates on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), which provides fast transactions and low fees, making it ideal for staking operations.

audit.question: Is the smart contract audited?
audit.answer: Yes, our smart contracts have been audited by CertiK and PeckShield, two leading blockchain security firms. The audit reports are publicly available on our website under the 'Security' section.

rewards.question: How does the smart contract handle rewards distribution?
rewards.answer: The smart contract automatically calculates rewards based on your staking tier and duration. Rewards are distributed daily and can be claimed at any time. The contract uses a time-weighted average to ensure fair distribution.

congestion.question: What happens if there's a network congestion?
congestion.answer: Our smart contract is designed to handle network congestion efficiently. In case of high network traffic, the contract will queue transactions and process them in order once the network stabilizes, ensuring no rewards are lost.

interaction.question: Can I interact directly with the smart contract?
interaction.answer: Yes, advanced users can interact directly with our smart contract using blockchain explorers or wallet interfaces. However, we recommend using our platform interface for the best experience and to avoid potential errors.

address.question: What's the contract address?
address.answer: Our main staking contract address is 0xc2d8434B6875394637e5a943c2103639E22D26D5. Always verify this address on our official website to avoid scams.

profitDistribution.question: How is profit distributed when I claim?
profitDistribution.answer: Profits are paid in 70% original staked token and 30% in AZC token (1 AZC = 1 USDT, will add liquidity later). Additionally, referrers receive profit sharing commission across 10 levels: 20-10-5-5-5-1-1-1-1-1%.

amounts.question: What are the minimum and maximum stake amounts?
amounts.answer: The minimum stake amount is $100. Maximum amounts vary by tier: Starter ($100-$999), Bronze ($1,000-$4,999), Silver ($5,000-$9,999), Gold ($10,000-$19,999), and Diamond ($20,000+).

rewards.question: How often can I claim rewards?
rewards.answer: Rewards can be claimed daily. Monthly MPY ranges from 9% to 18% depending on your staking tier, and you can continue earning until reaching 400% of your initial stake.

maxReturn.question: What happens when I reach 400% return?
maxReturn.answer: When your stake reaches 400% return (including initial stake amount), the staking process automatically stops.

addFunds.question: Can I add funds to an existing stake?
addFunds.answer: No, each stake is treated as a separate position with its own MPY rate and 400% cap. If you want to stake more, you need to create a new staking position.

mpyRates.question: How are MPY rates determined?
mpyRates.answer: MPY rates are determined by your staking tier, based on the amount you stake. Higher tiers receive higher MPY rates: Starter (9%), Bronze (11%), Silver (13%), Gold (15%), and Diamond (18%).

missClaim.question: What happens if I miss claiming daily profits?
missClaim.answer: You can claim profits at any time after 24 hours, but only once per cycle. Extra time will be carried over to the next claim (e.g., claiming after 30 hours will count 6 hours towards the next cycle).

platform.question: How secure is the platform?
platform.answer: We implement multiple security measures including multi-signature wallets, real-time monitoring systems, and regular security audits. Our AI trading system also includes risk management protocols to protect user funds.

losses.question: What happens if the AI bot makes losses?
losses.answer: Our AI system is designed with strict risk management protocols. While trading involves inherent risks, we maintain reserve funds to ensure consistent staking rewards regardless of market conditions.

userData.question: How do you protect user data?
userData.answer: We use industry-standard encryption for all user data and communications. We also adhere to strict data protection policies and never share your information with third parties without your consent.

twoFactor.question: Is there two-factor authentication (2FA)?
twoFactor.answer: No, users connect to the platform using their wallet address.

referral.question: How does the referral program work?
referral.answer: Our partner program offers three types of commissions: Direct Referral (6% for F1, 1% for F2 and F3), Profit Sharing across 10 levels (1-10%), and Leader Performance Bonus (up to 11% extra commission).

requirements.question: What are the requirements for each leader rank?
requirements.answer: Leader ranks are based on team volume: Silver +3% ($30k Team - $3k F1), Gold +5% ($100k Team - $5k F1), Platinum +7% ($200k Team - $10k F1), Diamond +9% ($350k Team - $15k F1), and Royal +11% ($500k Team - $20k F1). Each rank comes with increased commission rates and benefits.

commissions.question: How are commissions calculated and paid?
commissions.answer: Commissions are calculated based on your referrals' staking amounts and profits. They are paid in the same token as the original stake and can be claimed daily.

referralLimit.question: Is there a limit to how many people I can refer?
referralLimit.answer: No, there is no limit to how many people you can refer directly. The more people you refer, the higher your potential earnings from the partner program.

cta.title: Ready to Join the AZC Ecosystem?
cta.description: Start your journey with AZ Coin and unlock the future of decentralized finance

hero.title: Revolutionizing Finance with AI
hero.description: Building the future of decentralized finance through artificial intelligence and blockchain technology

content.paragraph1: AZ Coin (AZC) is at the forefront of the convergence between artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. Our mission is to democratize access to sophisticated trading strategies and financial tools that were previously available only to institutional investors.
content.paragraph2: Through our innovative ecosystem of multi-chain staking, AI-powered trading, and interactive gaming, we're creating new opportunities for users to grow their digital assets while contributing to a vibrant community.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.description: Guided by clear principles and ambitious goals

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To democratize access to sophisticated financial tools by combining the power of artificial intelligence with blockchain technology, creating opportunities for everyone to participate in the future of finance.

points.1: Make AI-powered trading accessible to everyone
points.2: Create sustainable yield opportunities across multiple blockchains
points.3: Build an engaged community through innovative gaming and social features

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the leading platform where artificial intelligence and blockchain converge, creating a new paradigm for financial inclusion, wealth creation, and technological innovation.

points.1: Pioneer the integration of advanced AI models in decentralized finance
points.2: Reach 1 million active users across our ecosystem by 2026
points.3: Establish AZC as a leading utility token in the AI-blockchain space

ecosystem.title: The AZC Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: A comprehensive suite of interconnected products and services powered by AZC token

multichainStaking.title: Multi-Chain Staking
multichainStaking.description: Stake across multiple blockchains including Ethereum, BSC, Solana, and more with unified rewards in AZC tokens.

aiTrading.title: AI-Powered Trading
aiTrading.description: Advanced AI models that analyze market patterns across major exchanges to execute profitable trades automatically.

telegramGaming.title: Telegram Gaming
telegramGaming.description: Engaging play-to-earn games accessible directly through Telegram, with AZC token rewards and social features.

crossExchange.title: Cross-Exchange Arbitrage
crossExchange.description: Automated systems that identify and capitalize on price differences across Hyperliquid, Binance, Bybit, and other exchanges.

aiBots.title: AI Trading Bots
aiBots.description: Customizable trading bots powered by our proprietary AI models, available to AZC token holders.

wallet.title: Decentralized Wallet
wallet.description: Secure multi-chain wallet with integrated staking, trading, and gaming features for a seamless experience.

aiTechnology.title: Our AI Technology
aiTechnology.description: Cutting-edge artificial intelligence powering our trading systems

multiModel.title: Multi-Model Integration
multiModel.description: Our system combines multiple specialized AI models, each optimized for different market conditions and trading strategies.

patternRecognition.title: Real-Time Pattern Recognition
patternRecognition.description: Advanced neural networks identify complex patterns across multiple timeframes that human traders might miss.

sentimentAnalysis.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentimentAnalysis.description: Natural language processing models analyze news, social media, and market sentiment to predict price movements.

riskManagement.title: Risk Management Algorithms
riskManagement.description: Sophisticated algorithms dynamically adjust position sizes and leverage based on market volatility and risk assessment.

crossExchange.title: Cross-Exchange Optimization
crossExchange.description: AI systems monitor liquidity and order books across exchanges to execute trades at optimal prices and minimal slippage.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: Our models continuously improve through reinforcement learning, adapting to changing market conditions.

power.title: The Power of AI Integration
power.description: Our proprietary system combines multiple specialized AI models, each trained on specific market conditions and trading strategies. By integrating these models and continuously optimizing their performance, we can identify profitable trading opportunities across major exchanges like Hyperliquid, Binance, and Bybit with unprecedented accuracy.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: Experts in AI, blockchain, and financial markets working together to build the future

passa.quote: MIT Finance graduate. 12 years in finance, 6 in blockchain. Former Goldman Sachs and Coinbase senior manager. DeFi pioneer
passa.name: Passa Rodriguez

dmitri.quote: PhD in Computer Science. Ethereum Foundation contributor. Built DeFi projects with $3B+ TVL. Smart contract expert.
dmitri.name: Dmitri Volkov

jessica.quote: Marketing strategist with experience at Binance. Led campaigns reaching 10M+ users. Blockchain advocacy since 2017.
jessica.name: Jessica Wang

james.quote: Cybersecurity expert with Google background. Ethical hacker. Secured multiple DeFi protocols worth $500M+.
james.name: James Kim

michael.quote: Former operations head at Aave. Launched in 20+ markets. MBA from Wharton. Optimizes platform efficiency.
michael.name: Michael Rodriguez

phase6.title: Global Expansion

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Azcoin! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our staking platform and services. By accessing Azcoin, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree, please refrain from using our platform.

items.age: You must be at least 18 years old and legally able to enter contracts to use Azcoin.
items.laws: You are responsible for complying with all applicable laws in your jurisdiction.

items.register: You must register an account with accurate and complete information to use Azcoin.
items.responsibility: You are responsible for keeping your account credentials confidential and for all actions under your account.

mechanism.title: Staking Mechanism
mechanism.content: By staking tokens, you agree to the automatic fund distribution outlined in our staking contract (e.g., allocations to Dev, Marketing, Leader, and Pool).

profitClaims.title: Profit Claims
profitClaims.content: You can claim profits every 24 hours, up to a maximum of 400% of your staked amount (in USDT).

maxOutLimit.title: Max out Limit
maxOutLimit.content: Total commission earnings are capped at 4x your initial investment.

referral.title: Referral Program
referral.content: Azcoin offers a multi-level referral system. Commissions depend on your upline structure, as defined in the Member Contract.
referral.details: Referral and profit-sharing details are available in our FAQs and staking documentation.

tokenUsage.title: Token Usage and AZC Token
tokenUsage.swap: Staked tokens are swapped to USDT via Uniswap for profit calculations.
tokenUsage.distribution: Profits are distributed as 70% in the original token and 30% in AZC tokens, with AZC valued at 1 USDT

items.taxes: You are liable for any taxes or legal duties tied to your staking and earnings.
items.fraud: You must not engage in fraudulent acts, such as manipulating referrals or exploiting platform flaws.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, logos, and materials on Azcoin belong to Azcoin or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.permission: You may not use or reproduce our content without written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.warranty: Azcoin is offered 'as is' without warranties. We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, accuracy, or full security.
liability.damages: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages from your use of the platform.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account for violating these Terms or engaging in prohibited activities.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your access to Azcoin ends, though some provisions (e.g., dispute resolution) remain in effect.

items.multipleAccounts: Creating multiple accounts to manipulate the referral system
items.hacking: Attempting to hack, disrupt, or damage the platform
items.illegal: Using the platform for illegal activities or money laundering
items.misinformation: Sharing false or misleading information about the platform

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.arbitration: Disputes will be settled via binding arbitration in Singapore, following the Singapore International Arbitration Centre (SIAC) Rules.
disputeResolution.classAction: You waive rights to join class action lawsuits or class-wide arbitration.

steps.notice: Written notice of dispute must be submitted to Azcoin
steps.language: If unresolved, arbitration will be conducted in English
steps.decision: Arbitrator's decision will be final and binding
steps.fees: Each party bears its own legal fees and expenses

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.content: We may revise these Terms periodically. Updates will be posted here, and continued use of Azcoin indicates your acceptance.

notificationProcess.title: Notification Process
notificationProcess.description: When we make significant changes to these Terms, we will notify you through:

methods.email: Email notifications (if you've provided your email)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: Azcoin Headquarters, 20 Prince Well Rd, North Yarmouth, Maine(ME)
contact.responseTime: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours and resolve any concerns within 14 days.

forceMajeure.title: Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: Azcoin will not be liable for any failure or delay in performance due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, natural disasters, war, terrorism, riots, embargoes, acts of civil or military authorities, fire, floods, accidents, network infrastructure failures, strikes, or shortages of transportation facilities, fuel, energy, labor, or materials.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the Terms will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.content: You may not assign or transfer these Terms, by operation of law or otherwise, without Azcoin's prior written consent. Any attempt by you to assign or transfer these Terms without such consent will be null and void. Azcoin may freely assign or transfer these Terms without restriction.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.content: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Azcoin regarding the use of the platform and supersede all prior and contemporaneous agreements, proposals, or representations, written or oral, concerning its subject matter.

TermsOfService.acceptance: By using Azcoin's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Azcoin, we value your privacy and are dedicated to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you interact with our staking platform and services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.content: When you sign up or use our platform, we may collect your name, email address, wallet address, and other contact details.

transactionData.title: Transaction Data
transactionData.content: We gather details about your staking activities, such as token deposits, profit claims, and referral commissions.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.content: We may collect your IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data to enhance security and improve our services.

serviceProvision.title: Service Provision
serviceProvision.content: To manage your staking, process transactions, and offer customer support.

communication.title: Communication
communication.content: To send you updates, notifications, and promotional offers about Azcoin.

security.title: Security
security.content: To detect and prevent fraud, unauthorized access, or illegal activities.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: To study usage trends and optimize our platform's performance and user experience.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Partners
thirdParty.content: We may share your data with trusted service providers (e.g., payment processors, analytics tools) who help us operate the platform.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.content: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights and users' safety.

blockchainTransparency.title: Blockchain Transparency
blockchainTransparency.content: Note that blockchain transactions are public. Your wallet address and transaction details may be visible on the blockchain network.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use industry-standard measures like encryption, secure servers, and regular audits to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute protection.

securityMeasures.servers: Secure, encrypted servers with regular security updates
securityMeasures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for sensitive data transmission
securityMeasures.audits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments

access.title: Access and Correction
access.content: You can request access to your data or correct any inaccuracies.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.content: You may request data deletion, subject to legal or contractual obligations.

optOut.title: Opt-Out
optOut.content: You can unsubscribe from promotional emails at any time.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and provide tailored content. You can adjust cookie settings in your browser.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function properly

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Changes will be posted here, and your continued use of Azcoin signifies acceptance of the updated policy.

updateProcess.title: Policy Update Process
updateProcess.description: When we make significant changes to this policy, we will notify you through:
methods: Email notifications (if you've provided your email)

previousVersions.title: Previous Versions
previousVersions.content: You can request access to previous versions of our privacy policy by contacting us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:
contact.address: Address: Azcoin Headquarters,20 Prince Well Rd, North Yarmouth, Maine(ME)

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.content: We strive to respond to all privacy-related inquiries within 48 hours and resolve any concerns within 14 days.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the one in which you reside. These countries may have different data protection laws. When we transfer your data, we take appropriate safeguards to ensure its protection in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When determining how long to keep your data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the information, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure, and applicable legal requirements.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to delete such information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.

PrivacyPolicy.acknowledgment: By using Azcoin's services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.

SwapPage.description: Instantly buy or sell tokens at superior prices
SwapPage.highPriceImpact: High price impact may result in unexpected outcomes.
SwapPage.youNeedToConnectWallet: You need to connect your wallet first
SwapPage.swapSuccessfulDescription: Your swap has been completed successfully. You can now view the transaction details below.

TokenSelector.noTokensFound: No tokens found. Try a different search term.
